description: The Game Material Coordinator is a vital member of the Jeopardy! the graphics production team, responsible for logging and managing assets as well as creating visually engaging content for the nation’s top-rated quiz show, Jeopardy! Working under the guidance of the Segment Producer and Senior Designer, the Game Material Coordinator plays a crucial role in the organization and creation of visual material that enhances the viewer experience.
responsibilities:
Support the Production Process
Track and organize files, manage assets, and prepare material for production
Assist with project coordination and document preparation, ensuring all deadlines are met efficiently
Contribute to Team Organization
Maintain and organize the design team, including managing file systems and asset libraries to ensure accessibility and efficiency
Collaborate on Creative Development
Brainstorm ideas and develop concepts collaboratively with the team
Transform creative visions into tangible visual assets that align with the show's aesthetic and brand
Assist with Image Editing
Utilize Photoshop for photo editing, retouching, and image manipulation to enhance visual content

qualifications.required:
Highly organized with excellent time management skills and a proven ability to meet deadlines consistently
Strong proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly in Photoshop, with knowledge of After Effects and/or Premiere considered a plus
Detail-oriented with the ability to multitask effectively while maintaining strict attention to detail
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment
Demonstrated design sense and the ability to translate concepts into visually appealing content
Creative thinker with a passion for exploring new ideas and pushing creative boundaries

benefits: At Jeopardy! We foster a collaborative and dynamic work environment where creativity and innovation thrive. As part of our team, you'll have the opportunity to contribute to an iconic television show while working alongside passionate and talented individuals. We offer competitive compensation packages, opportunities for professional development, and access to exclusive events and experiences.
